scripts.build: (node -e "if (! require('fs').existsSync('_downloads/profiles-resources.json')) {process.exit(1)} " || npm run downloadFHIR) && npm run generateShExJ
scripts.generateShExJ: for form in flat nest; do node ./bin/fhirToShExJ --$form _downloads/profiles-resources.json _downloads/profiles-types.json _downloads/valuesets.json fhir-$form.shexj; done
